name: >./PenetrationTest
description:
Dodge through as much ICE as you can without getting scathed and prove yourself the greatest hacker!

This is my first game jam entry, and my first game ever! For the first Extra Credits game jam and the Awesome Per Second theme, I thought about what feels the most viscerally satisfying to me in a game, and that's dodging through an attack using invulnerability frames. Since I'm not super skilled with any of the tools or principles I'm using I decided I should try something out there and see what happened if the player's sole action was the ability to dodge. The results are above.
